page.title: 16FARMING
page.content: {DAIRY} Around Winkleigh and other areas near Winkleigh the popular cows are Friesian. The E.E.C. have brought out milk quotas. Here is a comment from a farmer. " Quotas are necessary because of over production in milk, but are unfairly distributed because those who produce a lot of milk and flood the market only get cut by the same percentage as those who produce little." BEEF There is a lot of beef, with the second biggest abbatoir in Europe at Torrington.We have quite a few sheep mostly Suffolk and Suffolk cross.Poultry is reared for eggs and meat,wheat, barley and corn are grown. FARM MACHINES. Tractors of different sizes from 16hp to over 100hp. The following machines are used locally. Baler,linkbox,roller,hayturner,trailer plough,dungspreader,combine,buckrake, loader,silage harvester,grasscutter.
